game.name: Gibbets
game.description:
Not everyone dares to be an archer! It requires implementing the intense shooting abilities and archery abilities. These people are hanged by a group of monsters. Nobody knows whether these innocent people are good or bad souls. Who cares what he does. Here the main thing is that you have to save them using your unmatched archery skills. Are you ready friends? Join Gibbets and be prepared to control the bow and direction of the arrow! Have fun while completing multiple levels.

Make sure that you do not hit the civilians otherwise you would be killed and your game will be over. Focus on the screen and aim for the rope and shoot your target with the help of your arrow! There are 50 unique and challenging levels to play through and each level is full of matchless fun and entertainment. Remember previous levels were harder than the previous ones. Be ready to apply other creatures and tools to let them free when you progress in the game!

Cut the ropes using arrows while avoiding shooting only at the bad souls or you can say victims in this HTML5 shooting game! Keep you on your toes to solve out this stupid puzzle arcade and let the world that you are an amazing archer! Your chivalry would help to make enough coins and earn achievements. Good luck beating your previous scores and become a champion archer! There are plenty of online action games that are free to play without download.
